pitch.cc: Zach Stewart may prefer to go after Vernon Wells, whose OPS is .604 this season, with the slider rather than facing Erick Aybar, whose OPS is .672.
Zach Stewart is really trying to keep Howie Kendrick close; he is 11-for-14 in stolen base attempts this season.
Zach Stewart is still attacking Vernon Wells with the slider even though Wells hit one for a double last time up.
